mapper.select:
SELECT ticket_number, project_name, service_kbn_code FROM project WHERE is_active = true
AND ( ticket_number LIKE CONCAT('%', #{keyword}, '%') OR project_name LIKE CONCAT('%', #{keyword}, '%') )
ORDER BY created_at DESC

SELECT fi.function_code, fi.function_name, fi.description FROM project_function_info pf INNER JOIN function_info fi ON pf.function_code = fi.function_code AND pf.service_kbn_code = fi.service_kbn_code WHERE pf.ticket_number = #{ticketNumber} AND pf.service_kbn_code = #{serviceKbnCode} AND fi.is_active = true ORDER BY fi.function_code

SELECT p.ticket_number, p.project_name, p.service_kbn_code, p.status, c1.category_name as status_name, p.priority, c2.category_name as priority_name, p.description FROM project p LEFT JOIN category c1 ON p.status = c1.category_code AND c1.category_type_code = 'STATUS_REDMINE_KBN' LEFT JOIN category c2 ON p.priority = c2.category_code AND c2.category_type_code = 'PRIORITY_KBN' WHERE p.ticket_number = #{ticketNumber} AND p.is_active = true

SELECT fi.function_code, fi.function_name, fi.description FROM function_info fi LEFT JOIN project_function_info pf ON fi.function_code = pf.function_code AND fi.service_kbn_code = pf.service_kbn_code AND pf.ticket_number = #{ticketNumber} WHERE fi.service_kbn_code = #{serviceKbnCode} AND fi.is_active = true AND pf.function_code IS NULL /* 既に追加済みの機能を除外 */
AND ( fi.function_code LIKE CONCAT('%', #{keyword}, '%') OR fi.function_name LIKE CONCAT('%', #{keyword}, '%') )
ORDER BY fi.function_code
